Class Decks

java.lang.Object
  Decks

public class Decks
extends java.lang.Object

Represents one or more decks of cards.

Field Summary
 int STANDARD_DECK_SIZE
          The size of a standard deck of cards.
 
Constructor Summary
Decks(int num)
          Constructor to create several copies of the standard 52 deck of cards and to shuffle them all together.
 
Method Summary
 Card deal()
          Returns the next Card in the Deck.
 int getCount()
          Returns the number of Cards remaining in the Deck.
 int getNumDecks()
          Returns the number of Decks.
 void shuffle()
          Shuffles the Cards by selecting a random location for each Card.
 void sort()
          Sorts the Decks.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Lists the Cards remaining in the Deck.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

The size of a standard deck of cards.

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Decks

public Decks(int num)
Constructor to create several copies of the standard 52 deck of cards and to shuffle them all together.

Method Detail

deal

public Card deal()
Returns the next Card in the Deck. If the Deck is empty, the Deck is shuffled. Use your count instance variable to determine which Card to return. Decrement count.

getCount

public int getCount()
Returns the number of Cards remaining in the Deck.

getNumDecks

public int getNumDecks()
Returns the number of Decks.

shuffle

public void shuffle()
Shuffles the Cards by selecting a random location for each Card.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Lists the Cards remaining in the Deck.

public void sort()
Sorts the Decks.
